snippet: Federal regulators found numerous risks for contamination at about 30 pharmacies like the facility responsible for the tainted drug that caused a deadly meningitis outbreak last year.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration officials say they have found numerous unsafe practices at about 30 compounding pharmacies.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators found numerous risks for contamination at about 30 pharmacies like the facility responsible for the tainted drug that caused a deadly meningitis outbreak last year.

headline.seo: Unsafe Practices Found at Compounding Pharmacies
headline.main: Checks Find Unsafe Practices at Compounding Pharmacies
headline.print_headline: Checks Find Unsafe Practices At Compounding Pharmacies
